name: I CRAVE BLOOD
description:
Created for the GMTK 2021 Game jam with the theme "Joined Together"

A science experiment gone wrong? A demon from hell? Who knows what you are.

All that matters is that YOU CRAVE BLOOD. You NEED BLOOD. Use your tentacle, latch onto the fools who try to stop you, drain them, and kill them. For as long as you can.

In I CRAVE BLOOD, you play as a giant monster at the top of the screen who has control of their tentacle/tongue. You are constantly losing health, and need to drain the blood of enemies to replenish it. Use the end of your appendage to grab enemies, and use them to replenish your health, and flail them around to hit others.

Mouse Movement : Moves tentacle

Left Click: Grabs/Releases enemies or pickup.

The end of the tentacle is what can latch onto enemies, NOT where your mouse is.
